translations: v．痛恨，厌恶：强烈地不喜欢或反感某人或某事。
· She detests going to the dentist.

sentences.sentence: I hate Mexican food; She detests politicians.
sentences.translation: 我憎恨墨西哥食物；她憎恨政客。

sentences.sentence: The Lord detests the way of the wicked but he loves those who pursue righteousness.
sentences.translation: 恶人的道路，为耶和华所憎恶；追求公义的，为他所喜爱。

sentences.sentence: The Lord detests all the proud of heart. Be sure of this: They will not go unpunished.
sentences.translation: 凡心里骄傲的，为耶和华所憎恶，虽然连手，他必不免受罚。
